document.full_text: the trial of a pediatrician charged with sexually assaulting patients over more than a decade began and ended tuesday with prosecutors calling two police officers to testify.
document.title: mid-atlantic: delaware: pediatrician's rape case in judge's hands
lines_and_colors: the trial of a pediatrician charged with sexually assaulting patients over more than a decade began and ended tuesday with prosecutors calling two police officers to testify.
